item.description:
I need to get out and have a few laughs, boo been sick couple weeks, holding the event at one of my favorite places because service is great, huge dance floor and plenty of parking space .

Jimmy Plunkett will be performing, it will be a mix of what he does as a professional singer, and he also throws in a bit of humor 'LAUGHTER", which I know we can all def use. You can google him on Facebook (check it out on Scoreboard)and check out his web page for pictures and more info. Great some laughter just what the doctor ordered,lol, We will have a table reserved for dinner , TP'S told me there is a 5.00 cover after 8pm.

Ask the hostess when you come in for my table.

 

Give me a heads up for dinner in your RSVP
item.name: Dinner, Comedy, Dance
